Title: MediaTek Climbs After Flagging Strong Growth From China, India
Description: (Bloomberg) -- MediaTek Inc. shares climbed after a senior executive said second-quarter revenue growth is on track to come in toward the higher end of its forecast for a 24 to 32 percent rise, thanks to surging demand for mobile chips from China and India.

Title: Endura Technologies and MediaTek Inc. Announce Commercial Partnership
Description: DUBLIN and HSINCHU, Taiwan, May 4, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Endura Technologies (International) Ltd. today announced a commercial partnership with MediaTek Inc. that aims at demonstrating power, performance, and area improvements at advanced process nodes.

Title: MediaTek Inc. Announces Tender Offer for MStar Semiconductor, Inc.
Description: MediaTek), a leading fabless semiconductor company for wireless communications and digital multimedia solutions, announced today that its Board of Directors has approved a tender offer to acquire shares of MStar Semiconductor, Inc. (TSE:3697；Mstar).
